body:
I am facing the same issue, when I load the model in c++ through torch::jit::load I get the error message

```
terminate called after throwing an instance of 'c10::Error'
  what():  INVALID_ARGUMENT:main_module: Cannot find field. (deserialize at /pytorch/torch/csrc/jit/import.cpp:402)
frame #0: std::function<std::string ()>::operator()() const + 0x11 (0x7f0730567ba1 in /home/xhg/libtorch/lib/libc10.so)
frame #1: c10::Error::Error(c10::SourceLocation, std::string const&) + 0x2a (0x7f073056746a in /home/xhg/libtorch/lib/libc10.so)
frame #2: <unknown function> + 0x5d8c91 (0x7f0739e23c91 in /home/xhg/libtorch/lib/libtorch.so.1)
frame #3: torch::jit::load(std::istream&) + 0xbc (0x7f0739e2416c in /home/xhg/libtorch/lib/libtorch.so.1)
frame #4: torch::jit::load(std::string const&) + 0x46 (0x7f0739e24266 in /home/xhg/libtorch/lib/libtorch.so.1)
frame #5: main + 0x78 (0x4010fb in ./example-app)
frame #6: __libc_start_main + 0xf0 (0x7f073079a830 in /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6)
frame #7: _start + 0x29 (0x400f19 in ./example-app)

```
